basic.blooming: Flowering period April-May, viewing period 3-4 weeks

maintenance.soil: Likes slightly alkaline soil, may use peat adding a small amount of lime or baking soda,
maintenance.sunlight: Likes sunshine, shade properly under summer strong light
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply 1-2 times monthly in spring
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and yellowish leaves and withered flowers
